Cash.Pattern 1:
balance as at 30 September 2022 represented CNY[Amount] of cash at bank.

Management indicated that cash at bank was under supervision by the bank but had no related use restrictions imposed.
We read/obtained/check all bank statements and found no exceptions/discrepancies.
Cash.Pattern 2:
balance as at 30 September 2022 represented CNY[Amount] bank deposit.

The cash was under supervision with no restricted use.
We have obtained the bank statements as at 30 September 2022 and found no discrepancies.

AR.Pattern 1:
balance as at 30 September 2022 represented receivabbles of rental and property management income duie from [Which Entity?]. The Target recognised revenue using straight-line method; we reclassified the levelling impact of revenue recognition in the rent-free period to other non-current assets at the end of September 2022.
Management did not accrue bad debt provision for accounts receivales from [Entity], we indicatively accrued provision at the rate of 1% according to the Target’s policy.

Prepayments.Pattern 1: balance as at 30 September 2022 represented {upfront utility expense payments|CNY{amount} of upfront construction cost and CNY{amount} of utility expense payments} for the next {2-3|one to three} months of {CNY{amount}|prepaid utility expenses including water, electricity and internet}

OR.Pattern 1:
balance as at 30 September 2022 {amount} of utilities paid on behalf of {Which Entity?}
As indicated by management, the Target accrued {percentage} bad debt provision for utilities receivables aged within 1 year.

IP.Pattern 1:
balance as at 30 September 2022 mainly represented the net book value of the Targeted properties of CNY{amount}. The original value did not change over the period, the book value changed represented the depreciation of properties.

Project {Project_Name} was {type} that {Which Entity} previously acquired from {previous_owner}. The land was located in {location} ({size} sqm), the construction of Project {Project_Name} was completed in {completion_date} and was {leasing_status} over the period. The land and warehouses were depreciated using straight-line method of 50 years and 20 years of useful life, with the residual value rate of 0% and 4%, respectively.

As at this report date, Project {Project_Name} did not conduct final accounts. Though management said that most of the primary contracts had been verified and accounted, the original costs may still not be finalised. Potential under-estimated construction payables and CAPEX commitment may still exist, you should confirm with management if there are any future CAPEX plans and factor the capital commitments (if any) into your valuation model.

Total properties of Project {Project_Name} were mortgaged as loan collateral in favour of {bank_name}.
IP.Pattern 2:
balance as at 30 September 2022 comprised the net book value of {assets} (CNY{value}). The original costs of {property_type} did not change over the Period.

Project {Project_Name} was located in {location}. Both land parcels were in {usage} and acquired directly from {source}. Phase I land was acquited in {year} at a consideration of CNY{amount} with LUR expired in {expiration}. Phase II land was acquired in {year} at a consideration of CNY{amount} with LUR expired in {expiration}.

The land lots of Project {Project_Name} were amortised using straight-line method with 50 years of useful life and zero residual value. {property_type} were depreciated using straight-line method with 20 years of useful life and 4% residual value. As at this report date, Project {Project_Name} was completed but no final accounts had been conducted. Though management said that most of the primary contracts had been verified and accounted, the original costs may still not be finalised. Potential under-estimated construction payables and CAPEX commitments may still exist. Management said there was no CAPEX plan at current stage.

NCA.Pattern 1: balance as at {date} represented the residual value of {assets} including {items}. THese were depreciated using {depreciation_method} with {useful_life_range} and {residual_value}.
NCA.Pattern 2: balance as at {date} mainly represented {asset type} with a useful life of {useful_life}.

Other NCA.Pattern 1: represented the {receivables|levelling impact} arising from {levelling impact of revenue recognition|revenue recognition} in the rent-free period

Other CA.Pattern 1: balance as at {date} represented the deductible VAT input derived from {source} of CNY{amount}
Other CA.Pattern 2: balance as at {date} mainly represented CNY{amount} of deductible input VAT derived from {source}

AP.Pattern 1: balance as at 30 September 2022 mainly entailed {WHAT FEE?} and {WHAT FEE?} to {WHICH ENTITY?} of CNY{amount1} and {WHAT FEE?} to {WHICH ENTITY?} of CNY{amount2}

Tax payable.Pattern 1: balance as at 30 September 2022 represented {type1} payable of {amount1} and {type2} payable of {amount2}

Capital.Pattern 1: share capital of circa {amount1} was paid up as at {date}

Reserve.Pattern 1: balance as at {date} represented the surplus reserve {type} from {source}

OI.Pattern 1: total income for the period ended {date} was CNY{amount}, primarily comprising {details}. The income was mainly derived from {source}.
OI.Pattern 2: other income for the period totaled CNY{amount}, representing {details} from {source}.

OC.Pattern 1: total costs for the period ended {date} amounted to CNY{amount}, primarily consisting of {details}. The costs were mainly attributable to {source}.
OC.Pattern 2: other costs for the period totaled CNY{amount}, representing {details}.

Tax and Surcharges.Pattern 1: tax and surcharges for the period ended {date} amounted to CNY{amount}, including VAT of CNY{vat_amount}, urban maintenance and construction tax of CNY{umct_amount}, and education surcharge of CNY{edu_amount}.
Tax and Surcharges.Pattern 2: the entity paid total taxes and surcharges of CNY{amount} during the period, comprising {details}.

GA.Pattern 1: general and administrative expenses for the period ended {date} totaled CNY{amount}, primarily consisting of {details}.
GA.Pattern 2: G&A expenses amounted to CNY{amount} during the period, representing {details}.

Fin Exp.Pattern 1: finance expenses for the period ended {date} amounted to CNY{amount}, primarily comprising {details}.
Fin Exp.Pattern 2: financial expenses totaled CNY{amount} during the period, representing {details}.

Cr Loss.Pattern 1: credit losses for the period ended {date} amounted to CNY{amount}, representing {details}.
Cr Loss.Pattern 2: provisions for credit losses totaled CNY{amount} during the period, primarily for {details}.

Other Income.Pattern 1: other income for the period ended {date} totaled CNY{amount}, primarily comprising {details}.
Other Income.Pattern 2: additional income sources amounted to CNY{amount} during the period, representing {details}.

Non-operating Income.Pattern 1: non-operating income for the period ended {date} amounted to CNY{amount}, primarily comprising {details}.
Non-operating Income.Pattern 2: other non-operating income sources totaled CNY{amount} during the period, representing {details}.

Non-operating Exp.Pattern 1: non-operating expenses for the period ended {date} amounted to CNY{amount}, primarily comprising {details}.
Non-operating Exp.Pattern 2: other non-operating expenses totaled CNY{amount} during the period, representing {details}.

Income tax.Pattern 1: income tax expense for the period ended {date} amounted to CNY{amount}, representing the estimated tax liability based on {tax_rate}% effective tax rate.
Income tax.Pattern 2: the entity recorded income tax expense of CNY{amount} during the period, based on {details}.

LT DTA.Pattern 1: long-term deferred tax assets as at {date} amounted to CNY{amount}, primarily representing {details}.
LT DTA.Pattern 2: deferred tax assets totaled CNY{amount} as at {date}, comprising {details}.
